name: RMD-MP
savepath: This will be a large quality of life update when paired with some of the new launcher features described in the news post below. In the mod update itself, expect a Rift Shop update, some new Unique Items, a big change to the kill/death tracking system and our usual round of user-reported bug fixes. I hope you guys are excited about the upcoming changes and our continued progress!

D2RLAN has continued to evolve and push the boundaries of what's possible, while making it as easy-to-use and control as possible. Update 1.2.7 continues that trend; expanding the save file limit, implementing a stash paging system, and allowing socket counts to be displayed with items. These features are made available for all mods, so I hope you can enjoy them fully!
